nodeList.description:
Combo skill. Seals your health at your current amount of health, draining your ward to 0 and preventing you from gaining health or ward for up to 5 seconds. For that duration you gain more damage equal to your percent missing health.

Reactivate to release a wave of death dealing damage based on how long the seal has been active, and percent missing health.

nodeList.altText: Necrotic Resistance Shred reduces necrotic resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
nodeList.description: For each point of ward consumed by Death Seal, the wave of death is granted a chance to shred enemy necrotic resistance.

node.description:
Combo skill. Seals your health at your current amount of health, draining your ward to 0 and preventing you from gaining health or ward for up to 5 seconds. For that duration you gain more damage equal to your percent missing health.

Reactivate to release a wave of death dealing damage based on how long the seal has been active, and percent missing health.

nodeList.description: You gain necrotic resistance and armour for each point of ward consumed by Death Seal. This effect has a maximum for armour.

Damned is a stacking ailment that lasts for 3 seconds, deals 25 base Necrotic damage and reduces targets health regeneration by 20% per stack.

nodeList.nodeDescription: {Damned} is an ailment that deals necrotic damage over time.
